testCase.name: Get /getData Should return set of data
Get /getData Response time should be less than 200ms
Get /getData Response data should be an array
Get /getcategory Should return set of data
Get /getcategory Response time should be less than 200ms
Get /getcategory Response data should be an array
Get /getlanguage Should return set of data
Get /getlanguage Response time should be less than 200ms
Get /getlanguage Response data should be an array
GET /getsubcategory/:category Should return a set of data
GET /getsubcategory/:category Response time should be less than 200ms
PUT /isactive/:id Should update isactive field in the database
PUT /isactive/:id Should handle invalid ID with a 404 response
GET /getDataByCategory/:category_id should return data for a valid category ID
GET /getDataBysubCategory/:category_id should return data for a valid category ID
GET /getlanguage/:languageId should return data for a valid language_id
